author: krsna2683
content:
Hi, I came to this server from Eth2 hacker start (https://notes.ethereum.org/@protolambda/eth2_start). 

I have been mainly building Web3 applications and would like to do something at the protocol level. 

I thought of getting started by working on a project like the ones listed on the page but I noted that the page is 2 years old. I wonder if someone could tell me which of the projects would be most relevant at this time or alternatively point me to other resources. 

Thanks.
